dict.string: Duru Notes uses your camera to scan documents and capture text using OCR technology, helping you digitize printed text into your notes instantly.
Duru Notes uses your microphone to record voice notes and convert speech to text, making note-taking faster and more convenient.
Duru Notes uses speech recognition to provide real-time transcription of your voice notes, converting spoken words into searchable text.
Duru Notes uses your location to provide location-based reminders, alerting you about important notes when you arrive at or leave specific places.
Duru Notes uses your location to provide location-based reminders, alerting you about important notes when you arrive at or leave specific places.
Duru Notes accesses your photo library to attach images to your notes and scan text from existing photos using OCR.
Duru Notes sends notifications to remind you about your notes at scheduled times or when you reach specific locations.
